Package library.model.connection

Class BaseDao<T extends Entity>

java.lang.Object
library.model.connection.BaseDao<T>
Type Parameters:
T - Entity with which instance will be working
public class BaseDao<T extends Entity> extends Object
Common low level MySQL functions to be used by all DAO

      public static String escapeForLike(String param)

    • create

      public void create(T entity, String query, StatementFiller<T> filler) throws DaoException
      Creates entity of given type in DB
      Parameters:
      entity - instance of entity to be created
      query - SQL query to create that instance
      filler - fills statements of such entity types
      Throws:
      DaoException - in case of error

    • read

      public T read(long id, String query, EntityParser<T> parser) throws DaoException
      Reads entity of given type from DB.
      Parameters:
      id - id of entity to be read
      query - SQL query for reading
      parser - parser for result set which will be returned
      Returns:
      entity of given type
      Throws:
      DaoException - in case of error

    • count

      public int count(String pattern, String query) throws DaoException
      Counts number of rows for given SQL request with LIKE expression.
      Parameters:
      pattern - to be looked up
      query - SQL query using 'LIKE ?'
      Returns:
      number of rows matched the query
      Throws:
      DaoException - in case of error

    • update

      public void update(T entity, String query, StatementFiller<T> filler) throws DaoException
      Updates entity of given type in DB.
      Parameters:
      entity - to be updated
      query - SQL request
      filler - fills request with entity data
      Throws:
      DaoException - in case of error

    • delete

      public void delete(long id, String query) throws DaoException
      Deletes from DB entity of given type with such id
      Parameters:
      id - id of entity, which will be deleted
      query - SQL deleting query
      Throws:
      DaoException - in case of error

      public void deleteBound(long id1, long id2, String query) throws DaoException
      Throws:

    • createBound

      public void createBound(long id, T entity, String query, StatementFiller<T> filler) throws DaoException
      Bounds 2 entities in many-to-many relationship table
      Parameters:
      id - id of entity 1 (any subclass of Entity)
      entity - entity of given type
      query - SQL query
      filler - fills statement with info from entity of given type
      Throws:
      DaoException - in case of errors

    • findByPattern

      public List<T> findByPattern(String pattern, int num, int page, String query, EntityParser<T> parser) throws DaoException
      Finds all entities of given type by pattern (LIKE ? expression) with limit and offset. NB! Page should start from 1
      Parameters:
      pattern - pattern for looking up
      num - limit amount
      page - offset amount equal (page-1)*limit
      query - SQL lookup query
      parser - parses Result set to Entity of given type
      Returns:
      list of entities of given type
      Throws:
      DaoException - in case of errors

    • findByPattern

      public List<T> findByPattern(String pattern, String query, EntityParser<T> parser) throws DaoException
      Finds all entities of given type by pattern (LIKE ? expression). No limit and offset are used.
      Parameters:
      pattern - pattern for looking up
      query - SQL lookup query
      parser - parses Result set to Entity of given type
      Returns:
      list of entities of given type
      Throws:
      DaoException - in case of errors

    • findByString

      public List<T> findByString(String pattern, String query, EntityParser<T> parser) throws DaoException
      Finds all entities of given type by equals (= ?) expressions. No limit and offset are used.
      Parameters:
      pattern - pattern for looking up
      query - SQL lookup query
      parser - parses Result set to Entity of given type
      Returns:
      list of entities of given type
      Throws:
      DaoException - in case of errors

    • updateBound

      public void updateBound(long id1, long id2, String query) throws DaoException
      Updates bound for 2 entities in many-to-many relationship table.
      Parameters:
      id1 - id of first entity
      id2 - id of second entity
      query - SQL query
      Throws:
      DaoException - in case of error

    • getRecords

      public List<T> getRecords(String query, EntityParser<T> parser) throws DaoException
      Gets all entities of given type by non-parametrised query.
      Parameters:
      query - SQL query
      parser - parses result set to entity of given type
      Returns:
      list of entities
      Throws:
      DaoException - in case of error

    • read

      public T read(String lookUp, String query, EntityParser<T> parser) throws DaoException
      Read entity by unique string identifier.
      Parameters:
      lookUp - string identifier for entity, unique in table
      query - SQL query
      parser - parses result set to entity of given type
      Returns:
      entity of given type
      Throws:
      DaoException - in case of error
